name: Stachealism - Demo
description:
This is a short one-level proof of concept / demo / prototype.

Your goal is to vandalize art by putting mustaches on it, be it drawn on or even sculpted from modelling clay and stuck on. You must also beware of the security cameras and deactivate them.

This premise was inspired by the prompt 'play as the villain', the dramatic nature of which I aimed to not follow too closely, hence the sillier take on it.

Not a lot of functionality is currently present, seeing as it is just a test level. Hope to come back to it in the future and realise it some more!

By the way, there is a se-e-ecret way to get into the initial 'tutorial room' that you can only see through windows. Can you find it?
